name: Spear Dancer
text: You incorporate your two-handed reach weapon into a dizzying martial dance.
prerequisites: Weapon Focus (any two-handed reach weapon), Perform (dance) 4 ranks.
benefit: Each time you hit a creature with a twohanded reach weapon that you have Weapon Focus in, the creature is dazzled for 1 round.
staminaText: When you inflict the dazzled condition on an opponent using the Spear Dancer feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the duration of the effect by 1 round per stamina point spent.
